thread.title: VIDEOS: Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Promotional Interviews At One Place
thread.title_full: VIDEOS: Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Promotional Interviews At One Place

title: VIDEOS: Ram Charan's Bruce Lee Promotional Interviews At One Place
text:
Posted by: Pravallika Anjuri Published: Thursday, October 15, 2015, 11:59 [IST] 
Ram Charan 's Bruce Lee The Fighter promotions are at full swing. With Baahubali 's success, Telugu industry has not only increased its market, but has also learned the importance of promotions, as it is evident enough. Bruce Lee - The Fighter (U/A): Book Your Tickets Right Away! 
Star heroes like Mahesh Babu, Ram Charan, who are not used to come out and promote their films extensively, have become more accessible to the media and are actively participating in promoting the film. 
After Baahubali and Srimanthudu proving the importance of promotions, Ram Charan is also promoting Bruce Lee quite aggressively, which is giving great boost to the film. 
Bruce Lee has already been stuffed with tremendous crowd pulling factors and the makers have planned for a big release to make most of the craze, this festive season. 
On that note, here we bring you all the interviews of your favorites actors and director at one place, to make sure you don't miss out on any. 
Check out Ram Charan, Rakul Preet Singh, Sreenu Vaitla's interesting interviews in the slides below. VIDEOS: Bruce Lee Promotional Interviews At One Place 1/11 
Ram Charan talking about Bruce Lee, Chiranjeevi 150 and more. VIDEOS: Bruce Lee Promotional Interviews At One Place 2/11 Courtesy: N TV 
Ram Charan talking about Bruce Lee, his character in the film and why he chose Sreenu Vaitla over many other star directors. VIDEOS: Bruce Lee Promotional Interviews At One Place 3/11 
Rakul Preet Singh talking about her career, journey to films and Bruce Lee. 
Courtesy: I Dream Media VIDEOS: Bruce Lee Promotional Interviews At One Place 4/11 
Rakul about her birthday celebrations, Bruce Lee and her upcoming projects. 
Courtesy: Telugu Film Nagar VIDEOS: Bruce Lee Promotional Interviews At One Place 5/11 
Ram Charan reacting to Dasari comments. VIDEOS: Bruce Lee Promotional Interviews At One Place 6/11

Courtesy: Idlebrain VIDEOS: Bruce Lee Promotional Interviews At One Place 7/11 
Rakul Preet Singh reveals she is a hyper person. VIDEOS: Bruce Lee Promotional Interviews At One Place 8/11
